survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of the annual Global Tech Summit to assess their experience, satisfaction, and suggestions for future improvements.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the Global Tech Summit?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the Global Tech Summit?

questions.question_text: Which of the following conference sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the options are clearly displayed.

script.question_text: Which of the following conference sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the speakers at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency. Ensure clarity in options.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the speakers at the conference?

questions.question_text: What was your primary reason for attending the Global Tech Summit?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was your primary reason for attending the Global Tech Summit?

questions.question_text: Please specify your 'Other' reason for attending the conference.
questions.client_notes: Ensure the open-text field is only shown if 'Other' is selected in Q4.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with conditional display logic.

script.question_text: Please specify your 'Other' reason for attending the conference.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?

questions.question_text: Did you find the conference venue and facilities to be suitable for the event?
questions.client_notes: Include an open-ended follow-up question for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: Did you find the conference venue and facilities to be suitable for the event?

questions.question_text: Please provide any additional comments about the conference venue and facilities.
questions.client_notes: Optional open-ended question to gather detailed feedback.

script.question_text: Please provide any additional comments about the conference venue and facilities.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend the Global Tech Summit again next year?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with mandatory selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend the Global Tech Summit again next year?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future Global Tech Summits?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future Global Tech Summits?
